I believe its worth far exceeds its cost, making it an excellent investment for anyone looking to enhance their experience or productivity. For you, I am offering this remarkable product at a special introductory price of $85. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your life or work with a product that promises to deliver beyond expectations. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $85. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $85
(2) Reject Alice's offer
